content:
I am a Research Associate at CUNY SPH and a Biostatistician for the Bioconductor project at Roswell Park CCC. I am a senior member of the Waldron Lab led by Levi Waldron, PhD.
I enjoy teaching introductory biostatistics and programming courses at the CUNY School of Public Health. I teach R and SAS summer courses to MPH students who are highly motivated to gain practical experience with data analysis and management. I also provide students with one-on-one assistance with research projects and culminating MPH activities.

title: Marcel Ramos
